AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Legacy holder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]’s early life was spent mostly in debtor’s prison because his poor dad couldn’t pay off his debts so the whole family had to join him in the slammer, a fairly typical practice in Slug Home Nebula. [PAWN_nameDef]'s inner garden grew up.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dry hearted
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s childhood was a pitiful one—his father died of stomach cancer(not fun for a gasteropod) and left his family penniless due to his gambling. [PAWN_nameDef] was often made fun of in school for his studiousness and skin dryness, but nobody could have predicted [PAWN_nameDef]'s rise to power.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Vacuum hater
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] almost lost an eye being sucked by a vacuum cleaner. Focusing on going outside to dodge the terrifying monster favorised mucosa exugation. It's because of the wind. Ask Shai-Hulud it knows.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Inner brain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mother was never able to get through the thin with [PAWN_nameDef]'s father. He was tyrannical and had unorthodox sexual desires. That's what [PAWN_nameDef]'s mother relied on when she laid her eggs inside him. [PAWN_nameDef] and siblings devoured their host. [PAWN_nameDef] told later to her brood that [PAWN_nameDef]'s father did not die like that. Or if so that was accident, or maybe he deserved it. [PAWN_nameDef] inherited some tastes and predispositions from that family crunchy story.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Theater prodigy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: When [PAWN_nameDef] used to be in the transrace nursery, he was part of theater piece where a Zoltan embodied Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer from the terran subculture. The Zoltan was bullied by a young Mantis. [PAWN_nameDef] managed to mobilize his mindcontrol to make him stop. It worked and let [PAWN_nameDef] with soon to be dispersed guilty thoughts and a manipulative career seed within him.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Offshore brood
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a very motivated drug mule and made it a career when others would dramatically die for some reason. He also had at least 2 families. When truth was revealed, [PAWN_nameDef]'s trust in men was devastated even if he was a loving one and always took care of his offshore brood(s).

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Socially awkward
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always felt awkward concerning [PAWN_pronoun] morning dews. [PAWN_nameDef] cant bear being sighted when it happens and feels very vulnerable. That's why [PAWN_nameDef] chose to live as a night hermit.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rotting outside
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has never exugated like others. Others say [PAWN_nameDef] smells weird, but hey that's what moult is for.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Spacepirate fanboy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always dreamt to be a space pirate like Cobra, Harlock or Black Raven. [PAWN_nameDef] chose to let aside its race predispositions aside to live the dream, one day.
